publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1983 Susan Deacon: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2001—That the Health and Community Care Committee recommends that the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Paralytic Shellfish Poisoning) (Orkney) (Scotland) Order 2001 (SSI 2001/195) be approved. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm*

Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm
